fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - At night, you may camp outside someone's house. If no one visits your target, you shoot them. 3 Uses.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If you shoot an innocent player, you get arrested, losing all charges, and commit suicide due to being poorly cared for.
- Corporate players are evil to you. You don't kill yourself if you kill one, but you do get arrested and lose all charges of your ability.
